feature_extracting_method: 卷积神经网络自动特征提取
best_feature_extracting_method: 卷积神经网络自动特征提取
machine_learning_method: KNN、SVM(linear)、SVM(rbf)、1D-CNN

paper_url: Papers\md\Water Resources Research - 2023 - Dralle - Mapping Surface Water Presence and Hyporheic Flow Properties of Headwater Stream.md
paper_name: Mapping Surface Water Presence and Hyporheic Flow Properties of Headwater Stream Networks With Multispectral Satellite Imagery
research_object: Wetted channel extent and hyporheic flow properties in headwater stream networks
preprocessing_method: Data from walking surveys, drone surveys, high-flow surveys, and extrapolative/interpolative surveys were used to label satellite imagery. Channels with contributing areas greater than 10,000 m² were clipped to improve spectral signal.
best_preprocessing_method: Extraction of equally spaced 10 m nodes along the channel network and clipping to drainage areas greater than 10,000 m²
feature_extracting_method: Blue, green, red, red-edge, near infrared bands from RapidEye pixels and normalized difference water index (NDWI)
machine_learning_method: Random forest classification model

paper_name: A Cloud-Based Framework for Large-Scale Monitoring of Ocean Plastics Using Multi-Spectral Satellite Imagery and Generative Adversarial Network
preprocessing_method: atmospheric correction, radiometric calibration
feature_extracting_method: NDVI, FDI
machine_learning_method: random forest (RF), support vector machine (SVM), generative adversarial network-random forest (GAN-RF)

paper_name: Application of Artificial Neural Networks for Mangrove Mapping Using Multi-Temporal and Multi-Source Remote Sensing Imagery
preprocessing_method: orbit file correction, GRD border noise removal, thermal noise removal, radiometric calibration, terrain correction, speckle filtering, median reducer, standard scaler transformation
feature_extracting_method: multi-temporal synthetic aperture radar (SAR) and multi-spectral remote sensing data from Sentinel-1 and Sentinel-2
best_feature_extracting_method: multi-temporal synthetic aperture radar (SAR) and multi-spectral remote sensing data from Sentinel-1 and Sentinel-2
machine_learning_method: artificial neural networks (ANNs) with different topologies and specifications, including number of layers, neurons, learning algorithms, activation functions, and learning rates
best_machine_learning_method: ANN model with four hidden layers, 36 neurons in each layer, Adam learning algorithm, Relu activation function, and learning rate of 0.001

paper_name: Machine Learning Algorithms for Biophysical Classification of Lithuanian Lakes Based on Remote Sensing Data
research_object: Biophysical classification of lakes using Sentinel-2 data
preprocessing_method: Atmospheric correction using Sen2Cor algorithm, filtering no data pixels, retaining water pixels, applying further filtering based on shortwave infrared band B11, extracting a 3x3 pixel area centered at the national monitoring site location, and performing filtering based on the 783 nm band (B7).
best_preprocessing_method: Sen2Cor atmospheric correction algorithm with 20 m resolution and filtering reflectance below 0.0215 in band B11.
feature_extracting_method: Reflectance amplitude, band ratios (R705/R665, R560/R490, R560/R665, R560/R705), band differences (BD1 and BD2), empirical equation using BD2, apparent visible wavelength (AVW), hue angle, color based on Forel-Ule colour scale (FU), and month.
machine_learning_method: Logistic regression (LR), Support vector machine (SVM), Random forest classifier (RF), AdaBoost classifier (Ada), XGBoost Classifier (XGB), Artificial Neural Networks (ANN)

paper_name: An Indirect Inversion Scheme for Retrieving Toxic Metal Concentrations Using Ground-Based Spectral Data in a Reclamation Coal Mine, China
research_object: soil heavy metal concentrations (Fe and Ni)
preprocessing_method: Savitzky-Golay filter, first derivative reflectance (FDR), second derivative reflectance (SDR), continuum removal (CR), continuous wavelet transform (CWT)
feature_extracting_method: Correlation analysis, CWT decomposition scales
machine_learning_method: Partial least squares regression (PLSR), extremely learning machine (ELM), random forest (RF), support vector machine (SVM)

paper_name: Estimating Chlorophyll-a Concentration from Hyperspectral Data Using Various Machine Learning Techniques: A Case Study at Paldang Dam, South Korea
preprocessing_method: standard scaler, min-max scaler, PCA, PLS
feature_extracting_method: PCA, PLS
machine_learning_method: OLS, RF, ET, GB, AdaBoost, KNN, SVR, XGBoost

paper_name: Detection of Water Hyacinth (Eichhornia crassipes) in Lake Tana, Ethiopia, Using Machine Learning Algorithms
preprocessing_method: Cloud-masked monthly median composite Landsat 8 and Sentinel 2 data; atmospherically corrected Level 2A processed Sentinel 2 MSI and Level 2 Landsat 8 OLI Tier 1 surface reflectance data; spectral indices derived from raw spectral bands.
best_preprocessing_method: Atmospheric correction and cloud masking using Google Earth Engine's cloud mask algorithm on atmospherically corrected Level 2A Sentinel 2 MSI and Level 2 Landsat 8 OLI data.
feature_extracting_method: Spectral bands from Landsat 8 and Sentinel 2 images, four derived environmental indices (NDVI, SRI, NDWI, MNDWI).
best_feature_extracting_method: Spectral bands and indices (NDVI, SRI, NDWI, MNDWI) from Sentinel 2 images.
machine_learning_method: Random Forest (RF), Support Vector Machine (SVM), Classification and Regression Tree (CART)

paper_name: Mapping Specific Constituents of an Ochre-Coloured Watercourse Based on In Situ and Airborne Hyperspectral Remote Sensing Data
research_object: water quality parameters (TFe, Fe(II), Fe(III), sulphate, Chl-a)
preprocessing_method: atmospheric correction using ATCOR software, masking out adjacent effects and irrelevant spectral information
feature_extracting_method: spectral indices based on specific wavelength bands (e.g., RRs(580)-RRs(455), RRs(701)/RRs(563))
machine_learning_method: linear regression, logarithmic regression, exponential regression, potential regression
best_machine_learning_method: linear regression for TFe, logarithmic regression for Chl-a

paper_name: Prediction of Soil Water Content Based on Hyperspectral Reflectance Combined with Competitive Adaptive Reweighted Sampling and Random Frog Feature Extraction and the Back-Propagation Artificial Neural Network Method
preprocessing_method: Savitzky–Golay (SG) smoothing
feature_extracting_method: competitive adaptive reweighted sampling (CARS) and random frog (Rfrog)
machine_learning_method: extreme learning machine (ELM), back-propagation artificial neural network (BPANN), support vector machine (SVM)

paper_name: Water-absorption-trough dewatering machine for estimation of organic carbon in moist soil
preprocessing_method: continuum removal, band-depth acquisition
feature_extracting_method: water absorption troughs around 1400 and 1900 nm
machine_learning_method: multiple linear regression (MLR), Water Absorption Trough Dewatering Machine (WATDM)

preprocessing_method: baseline correction, first-order derivatives, PEER algorithm
feature_extracting_method: PCA, first-order derivatives, random forest feature selection

paper_name: Discrimination of periodontal pathogens using Raman spectroscopy combined with machine learning algorithms
research_object: Periodontal pathogens (Porphyromonas gingivalis, Fusobacterium nucleatum, Aggregatibacter actinomycetemcomitans)

machine_learning_method: Extra trees, AdaBoost, Gradient boosting, Linear discriminant analysis, Support vector machine, Multi-layer perceptron, Passive-aggressive classifier, Quadratic discriminant analysis

paper_name: Classification of chocolate according to its cocoa percentage by using Terahertz timedomain spectroscopy
research_object: chocolate samples with different cocoa percentages
preprocessing_method: linear filter to reduce image noise
best_preprocessing_method: linear filter to reduce image noise
feature_extracting_method: absorbance curve, dielectric function, absorption coefficient
machine_learning_method: decision trees, linear discriminant analysis (LDA), quadratic discriminant analysis (QDA), support vector machines (SVM), closer neighbor classifiers, set classifiers, naive Bayesian classifiers
